body:
## Expected Behavior
1. newChildWorkflowExecutionTerminatedEvent not using WorkflowExecutionTerminatedEventAttributes
2. remove Cause from WorkflowExecutionCancelRequestedEventAttributes since not used

comments.body: I'd like to get to know about this repository more.  Are these expected changes still required in the repository at this stage, since the issue is quite old?
Hi, I'd like to work on this issue as my first contribution. Is this still open for work @wxing1292 ?

> remove Cause from WorkflowExecutionCancelRequestedEventAttributes since not used

This no longer holds. We have added Reason to `RequestCancelWorkflowExecutionRequest`.

> newChildWorkflowExecutionTerminatedEvent not using WorkflowExecutionTerminatedEventAttributes

Not quite following this one. Is the proposal to reuse (embed) or not reuse WorkflowExecutionTerminatedEventAttributes for ChildWorkflowExecutionTerminatedEvent?

the var is not used at all
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/0c9e6f07a06cc4e30df65534ce33d9fb56e6e781/service/history/workflow/mutable_state_impl.go#L5327

either use it or remove
same applies to all child* internal APIs

Thanks for the clarification!, Iâ€™ll proceed to remove the unused `WorkflowExecutionTerminatedEventAttributes` .
Shall I take this one as my first issue @yycptt @wxing1292 ?

If not you can suggest similar issue to work on as beginner as I'm interested in this project and willing to contribute in long term.
Thanks for support

> proceed to remove the unused `WorkflowExecutionTerminatedEventAttributes`

Yeah that sounds like a great first issue. Thanks @vaibhavyadav-dev!

@yycptt I've made PR, let me know if there any changes required.
Thanks

Thank you @vaibhavyadav-dev! Just stamped the PR. I will get it landed once the tests pass

Thanks again for your contribution!

You folks are building something amazing â€” truly appreciate the effort behind Temporal. You'll definitely see me around more often!
Best of luck with everything and thanks again @yycptt ðŸ™Œ

title: Code cleanup
